docs.title: Copying the template
docs.text:
If you are running this as a company repository, then create your repository as per the normal flow and make sure to reference this as your template

If you are creating this as a test project in your own workspace, or organisation, then in the github interface, navigate to this repo page and select create from template, and then choose your own workspace to save the repository to.

docs.title: Initialising your project
docs.text: Once cloned to your local environment, open a powershell window and navigate to the reposiry directory. Run the init.ps1 file to rename the repository to your new name.

docs.title: Diagrams
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.text: This section is testing basic MP4 playing functionality

LFS Video referenced by content URL
docs.text: LFS content works with a workaround, but I have removed content because when creating a new repository from a template, the LFS content is not accessible from the new repository.
